about_the_game:
Accessing the DLC:

After downloading the content, find the game in your computer's Steam Client, select “properties”, find the “local files” option and select “explore”. This will take you to the game files, where is the DLC.

After accessing the folder titled "Soundtrack", you will be able to view all the DLC content!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
